item.title: Here's what to know about Trump's pick to lead the IRS, Billy Long
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump wants former lawmaker and auctioneer Billy Long to replace IRS Commissioner Danny Werfel.

item.title: Trump taps former Sen. David Perdue as next ambassador to China
item.description: Former Sen. David Perdue pushed President-elect Donald Trump's debunked lies about electoral fraud during his failed bid for Georgia governor in 2022.

item.title: Biden considering preemptive pardons for perceived enemies of Trump
item.description: President Biden is weighing giving preemptive pardons to perceived enemies of President-elect Donald Trump to shield them from possible "retribution."
